QuestData.Title: Taking the Walls
QuestData.Description:
Sabellian and the other dragons are holding back the djaradin for now. We must act quickly to secure the high towers and ensure our victory.
You and I shall clear the siege arbalests that threaten us from above.
Let me know when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Eliminate the three Siege Arbalests and Champion Choruk.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. Sabellian and his forces will hold off the djaradin, while I activate the Oathstone to restore power.
